entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
